title: VR-Based Furniture Product Demonstration System Utilization Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of furniture product characteristics and smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: VR simulation training specialized in product explanation and customer service scenarios linked to language curricula

learning_goals: Learners can describe the 3D spatial sense and functionality of furniture products in VR environments with 80% accuracy
Learners can creatively reconstruct more than three usage scenarios for furniture products through VR simulations
Based on VR experiences, learners can identify product characteristics (material, size, usability) 30% more accurately compared to paper catalogs

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
